name: Lasagna Soup
author: Suzy Mazz
summary: It's fall and it's time for soup and lasagna! You can combine the two into one delicious recipe!
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with basil
1 (14.5 ounce) can crushed tomatoes with basil
2 sprigs fresh basil, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese, or more to taste
½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat
Cook hot and mild sausage, stirring to break up into pieces, until browned, about 5 minutes
Add onions; cook and stir until translucent, about 5 minutes
Stir in garlic, oregano, and red pepper flakes; cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes
Stir tomato paste into the paste
Fill tomato paste can with water and pour in; mix well
Pour in beef broth, diced tomatoes, crushed tomatoes, and wine
Stir in basil sprigs, salt, and pepper
Bring soup to a boil; reduce heat and simmer until flavors combine, at least 30 minutes
Mix ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, and Parmesan cheese together in a bowl; season with salt and pepper
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook bow-tie pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Divide pasta among serving bowls; spoon some of the ricotta cheese mixture on top
